name: Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta
caption: A vast inland river delta and estuary in Northern California.

name: Antioch Bridge
caption: A bridge crossing the San Joaquin River, connecting Antioch and Sherman Island.

name: Rio Vista
caption: A small city located along the Sacramento River in the Delta region.

name: Isleton
caption: A historic town known for its Chinese and Japanese heritage.

name: Sherman Island
caption: An island in the Sacramento-San Joaquin River Delta popular for windsurfing.
